name: TheSeeker
description:
"The Seeker" is a Game Jam submission built in Unreal Engine 4.26 for the Epic MegaJam 2021 contest. I made this game on my own. Most of the assets that used in this game are in the permanently free collection of unreal marketplace (including the buildings and characters). VFX that used in this game is from monthly marketplace giveaways assets. In this game you have 10 minutes to close all of the gates and run from this dimension. You must dodge the monsters and lightnings.

Good luck and enjoy.
